title: Paramount’s hostile bid to take over Warner Bros Discovery continues via proxy fight, lawsuit
full_text: Paramount’s hostile bid to take over Warner Bros Discovery continues via proxy fight, lawsuit. For months, Netflix and Paramount have sought to finalise a deal to acquire WBD’s film and television studios and vast content library, with any resulting media deal set to become one of the biggest ever in history. Thus far, WBD's board has rejected Paramoun…. Paramount Skydance plans to nominate directors to the board of Warner Bros Discovery (WBD) to vote against its merger with Netflix, continuing its hostile takeover bid of the company.Paramount filed … [+4202 chars]
